author: Dynamik86

text: @VGKing Not that this was the case, but if you think about it, having the controls this way really causes your mind to think with more balance. Kind of what martial arts teaches, you don't always want to punch with your right hand, you need to be able to do the same thing on both limbs equally well. Maybe the game makers were trying to sneak some of that in?
author: thedarkener

text: BTW, it's Spike and Hammer. Respect the original
